entry.title: Lip Brush

Vendor: Kari Gran
Type: Makeup Brush
Price: 10.00

Meet your new favorite lip brush to go with your Lip Whip. Rose gold and retractable so you never have to worry about losing a cap!

• The Lip Brush works well with all of Kari Gran's Lip Whips and is perfect to use on the go.

• Brushed Aluminum in Rose Gold

• Retractable - Monogramed with Kari Gran Logo

• Synthetic Brush

Ingredients

Directions

entry.title: Tinted Balms
entry.summary:
Vendor: Olio E Osso
Type: Skin Balm
Price: 28.00

Olio E Osso's most essential, versatile product is nourishing on lips and cheeks, soothing on skin and hair, and adored by all who discover them. Swipe across lips or slide over cheekbones for a subtle glow.

No. 0 Netto - This natural menthol balm is useful all over the body. It tingles on the lips, clears nasal and chest congestion, and stimulates tired temples.

No. 1 Clear - Olio E Osso's most versatile balm is useful all over the body, its emollient texture melts into lips, tames split ends, flyaway hair, stray eyebrows and beards, and conditions cuticles, elbows and dry patches.

No. 2 French Melon - Perfectly pigmented balm for a blush of color on the lips or cheeks.

No. 3 Crimson - A sheer touch of classic crimson to brighten and enrich your lips and cheeks.

No. 4 Berry - Soft and luminous, this transparent aubergine stain adds depth to lips and highlights cheeks.

No. 5 Currant - Enhance your natural beauty with a perfect wash of warmth on lips and cheeks.

No. 6 Bronze - Never glittery, this is Olio E Osso's first balm with a hint of shimmer. Use as you would a bronzer or highlighter for a natural glow.

No. 7 Blush Shimmer - Slightly iridescent, this light pink shimmer can be worn on its own for subtle brightening on lips or cheeks. Great layered over any of Olio E Osso's other tinted balms for a deeper look.

No. 8 Persimmon - Rich, deep and toasty orange, this balm will give your cheeks and lips a subtle wash of warmth that is stunning on its own or layered with other balms.

No. 9 Spring - A breezy take on a spring bloom to add a bit of brightness to your lips and cheeks.

No. 10 Tea Rose - Graceful and grounded, this beautiful rose hue will enhance your natural glow.

No. 11 Féte - A truly beautiful celebration of light. Féte is perfect for layering, highlighting or wearing on its own.

No. 12 Plum - Warm and rich with a slight shimmer of gold, use Plum to deepen and enhance lips and cheeks.

No. 13 Poppy - A lovely red with subtle shining vibrance, brightens the lips and cheeks.

• Made by hand in small batches in Portland, Oregon

• .35 oz

Ingredients

No. 0 Netto: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Menthol (Natural), Eucalyptus Radiata (Eucalyptus) Leaf Oil

No. 1 Clear: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil

No. 2 French Melon: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Red Lake 21 (CI 45380)

No. 3 Crimson: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Carmine (CI 75470)

No. 4 Berry: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Carmine (CI 75470), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxide (CI 77499)

No. 5 Currant: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Iron Oxide (CI 77491)

No. 6 Bronze: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Mica, Iron Oxide (CI 77491)

No. 7 Blush Shimmer: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Mica, Carmine (CI 75470), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)

No. 8 Persimmon: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Annatto (CI 75120), Carmine (CI 75470)

No. 9 Spring: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Carmine (CI 75470)

No. 10 Tea Rose: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Iron Oxide (CI 77492), Carmine (CI 75470)

No. 11 Féte: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Synthetic Fluorophlogopite, Tin Oxide (CI 77861), Limonene, Linalool, Citral

No. 12 Plum: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Mica (CI 77019), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Iron Oxide (CI 77491) Carmine (CI 75470), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Tin Oxide (77861), Silica, Limonene, Linalool, Citral

No. 13 Poppy: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Nut Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Mica (CI 77019) Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Carmine (CI 75470), Iron Oxide ( CI 77491), Limonene, Linalool, Citral

Directions

No. 0 Netto: Apply to lips, chest, temples and sore muscles.

No. 1 Clear: Apply to lips, hair and dry skin.

No. 2-5, 7-13: Apply to lips and cheeks.

No. 6 Bronze: Apply to lips, cheeks and skin. Great layered over any of our other tinted balms for a deeper look.

entry.title: Lipstick
entry.summary:
Vendor: Y et Beaute
Type: Lipstick
Price: 32.00

A premiere color collection inspired by the founder's travels and practicing yoga in India, these stunning, highly-pigmented lipsticks are crafted in Italy from natural & certified organic ingredients.

Shades

Bisou: A mellow earthy pink

Calme: A feminine fuchsia with a blue undertone

Edie: A violet with a vivid streak

James: A blackened plum

Lou: A tawny pink

No 11: An energetic pop of pink

No 21: An audacious pinky red

Soho: A deep dusty mauve

Vivienne: An elegant raspberry

Tranquille: A pale, whisper-weight rose

• Crafted in Italy, all Y Et Beauté's products are Non-nano, Paraben-Free, Cruelty-Free, Sulfate-Free and Phthlate-Free

• Never tested on animals

Ingredients

Castor Seed Oil*, Sweet Almond Oil*, Beeswax*, Candelila Wax*, Cranberry Seed Oil*, Rice Bran Wax*, Jojoba Seed Oil*, Carnauba Wax*, Shea Butter Oil*, Kernel Oil*, Octyldodecanol, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Ethyl Vanilin, Resveratrol. *Certified Organic Ingredients

May Contain: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499) Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Red 6 Lake (CI 15850), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985)

Directions

This lipstick is highly pigmented. Wear over your favorite lip balm for a glossy look. Apply a layer and blot for a sheer matte effect. Apply multiple layers for bold lips.

entry.title: Lip Gloss
entry.summary:
Vendor: NU Evolution
Type: lip gloss
Price: 28.00

NU Evolution's Non-Sticky Lip Gloss formula is made with natural and organic ingredients and formulated with a nourishing blend of: Cocoa & Shea Butter, Coconut, Castor & Jojoba Oil.

Shades

Bling: What girl doesn't love a little bling in her life? This golden gloss has high shine and enough sparkle to draw him or her in every time! This item can be used for multiple purposes: Lip Gloss, which looks beautiful on its own or you can layer over your favorite lipstick color to add more drama! In addition, it can be used as the perfect highlighter on your cheekbones.

Fig: A gorgeous plum lip gloss with a hint of gold shimmer and a level of shine that will get you noticed every time. This is definitely a go-to everyday color!

Malibu: Malibu is your "go to" gloss for that perfect daytime natural look! With a matte finish in a creamy flesh tone color.

Naughty: Sexy nude with a high gloss shine that will get you in (good) trouble every time.

Plum: A delectable semi-sheer purple mauve lip gloss that satisfies all of your cravings.

• Made WITHOUT: Parabens, Phenoxyethanol, Propylene Glycol, Dimethicone, Talc, Propylene Glycol, Bismuth Oxychloride, Petroleum, Artificial Dyes, Synthetic Fragrances, Phthalates, Mineral Oil

• Cruelty free, Gluten free

Ingredients

Ricinus Communis (Castor) Oil *, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil *, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil *, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Oil*, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Cera Alba (Bees Wax)*, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax*, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa Butter)*, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter)*, Tocopherol Acetate (Vitamin E), Curcuma longa (Tumeric) Root Powder, Origanum Vulgare (Oregano) Leaf Extract*, Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Extract*, Cinnamomum Zeylanicum (Cinnamon) Bark Extract*, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract*, Lavendula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Extract*, Hydrastis Canadensis (Goldenseal) Root Extract*, Citrus Medica Limonum (Lemon) Peel Extract*, Citrus Grandis (Grape Fruit) Seed Extract Preservative, Vanilla Extract (Fragrance - Naturally derived). May Contain : Titanium Dioxide (CI-77891), Iron Oxides (Cl-77499), (CI-77491), (CI-77492), Tumeric Powder, Kaolin, Mica. *Certified Organic

Directions

entry.title: Lipstick
entry.summary:
Vendor: NU Evolution
Type: Lipstick
Price: 30.00

NU Evolution's lipsticks are richly pigmented & formulated with a nourishing blend of Castor Oil, Sunflower Seed Oil, Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Cocoa Butter, Jojoba Oil & Vitamin E.

Shades

Allure: The perfect shade of nude

Chianti: Like a fine glass of Chianti wine, this color is a truly stunning, purple mauve

Coquette: A gorgeous orange coral

Delish: Pink with a hint of coral

Diva: Be bold and own it with this fabulous hot pink shade

Entice: ENTICE everyone with this fabulous berry red

Femme Fatale: Exude an air of mystery with this seductive orange-red shade

Ingredients

Ricinus Communis (Castor) Oil*, Cera Alba (Beeswax)*, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Candelilla Wax, Helianthus Annuus (Sun Flower) Seed Oil*, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter)*, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Butter*, Simmondsia Chinesis (Jojoba) Seed Oil*, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Cetyl Alcohol, Potassium Sorbate, Origanum Vulgare (Oregano) Leaf Extract*, Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Extract*, Cinnamomum Zeylanicum (Cinnamon) Bark Extract*, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract*, Lavendula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Extract*, Hydrastis Canadensis (Goldenseal) Root Extract*, Citrus Medica Limonum (Lemon) Peel Extract*, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Seed Extract*, Tocopherol Acetate (Vitamin E), Vanilla Extract (Fragrance - Naturally derived). May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CL-77891), Iron Oxides (CI-77499), (CI-77491), (CI-77492). *Certified Organic

entry.title: Lip Whip - Rosie Gold
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kari Gran
Type: Cheek & Lip Tint
Price: 24.00

This lovely shade mixes your favorite blush tones with a light gold shimmer, giving you that barely peach, sun-kissed look.

As with all Kari Gran Lip Whips, Jeannie is filled with good-for-you ingredients including a combination of organic oils, organic beeswax, and non-GMO Vitamin E, with a hint of organic peppermint essential oil.

The inspiration behind the new Lip Whip is Jeannie Oliver. As a certified holistic nutrition and wellness coach, fitness nutrition specialist, personal trainer and classically trained chef, Jeannie has taken her passion for helping people and turned it into a reality by empowering people to reshape the relationship between food, their bodies and ultimately, their lives.

• Crafted with organic, non-GMO and wild harvested ingredients

• Paraben free, Sulfate free, Phthalate free, Cruelty free, Petroleum free

• Handmade in Seattle

• 7 ml

Ingredients

Organic Ricinus Communis (Castor Seed) Oil, Organic Beeswax, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower), Organic Camellia Oleifera (Camellia Seed) Oil, Organic Olea Europaea (Olive), Calendula Officinalis (Calendula) Oil, Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxides, Carmine, Silica, Manganese Violet, Tocopherol (Non GMO Vitamin E from Sunflower), Organic Mentha X Piperita (Peppermint) Oil.

Directions

Apply to lips as needed.

Type: Lip Balm

What's in a name? Kari Gran was thrilled to collaborate with former beauty editor turned health coach, Jolene Hart to create this exciting color, aptly named "Jolene." With its bright, opaque pigment, Jolene makes a statement worn alone or pairs with Shimmer for a bold rosé champagne shine. And as usual, the Lip Whips give your lips a beautiful and healthy moisturizing boost.

Formulated with the same soothing combination of natural ingredients found in all their Lip Whips, Marsala offers a sheer wine-red color with luster + shine. And as usual, the Lip Whips give your lips a beautiful and healthy moisturizing boost.

Price: 24.00

The exclusive new shade is light in feel and boasts a rich berry hue with a hint of shimmer to add a bit of effortless glam to any situation.

As with all Kari Gran Lip Whips, Jeannie is filled with good-for-you ingredients including a combination of organic oils, organic beeswax, and non-GMO Vitamin E, with a hint of organic peppermint essential oil.

The inspiration behind the new Lip Whip is Jeannie Oliver. As a certified holistic nutrition and wellness coach, fitness nutrition specialist, personal trainer and classically trained chef, Jeannie has taken her passion for helping people and turned it into a reality by empowering people to reshape the relationship between food, their bodies and ultimately, their lives.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Kari Gran
Type: Lip Balm
Price: 20.00

A perfect everyday lip balm that complements the Kari Gran skin care system, Lip Whip contains a soothing combination of ingredients. Handy in the purse, in the car or on the night stand, Lip Whip is beautiful alone or paired with lipstick and gives lips a sensual, glossy, moisturizing boost.

Available in Peppermint & Cinnamon Pimenta Berry. Lip Whip is packaged in petite screw top pots.

entry.title: Sesame Lip Liner
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ere Perez
Type: Lip Liner
Price: 21.00

A hero lip pencil to expertly outline and define your lips naturally. Can also fill in lips for a matte lipstick look. Featuring sesame oil to help protect + soften the skin around the lips, while delivering smooth contours and lines. A nourishing natural formula that compliments all skin tones.

Easy application in a slimline pencil that blends and colors like a pro. Perfectly suits all Ere Perez lip products.

Naughty - Brown Rose

Shy - Nude

Sweet - Natural Pink

• Paraben free, Sulfate free, Cruelty free

Ingredients

octyldodecyl stearoyl stearate, C10-18 triglycerides, hydrogenated vegetable (olus) oil, sweet almond (prunus amygdalus dulcis) oil, carnauba (copernicia cerifera) wax, vegetable (olus) oil, candelilla (euphorbia cerifera) wax, mica, sesame (sesamum indicum) oil, polyglyceryl-3 diisostearate, glyceryl caprylate, tocopheryl acetate (vitamin E), sorbic acid. May contain +/- iron oxides, CI 77891.

Directions

Starting with the top lip, trace the pencil around the outer skin of the lip. Repeat on the lower lip. Next, color your lips inside with the pencil line and then apply your favorite Ere Perez lip product. Define edges with Ere Perez's eco vegan lip & conceal brush.

entry.title: Lip Crayon
entry.summary:
Vendor: Axiology
Type: lip crayon
Price: 26.00

Axiology’s lip crayon formula is crafted with deeply replenishing ingredients that keep lips hydrated, all day long. These heavy pigmented shades sweep the lips in a luxurious matte finish—and never lose their luster. With a buttery-soft texture and all-natural + organic ingredients, this lip crayon line is made for the sophisticated and kind lipstick connoisseur.

• 100% Natural, 100% Vegan, Cruelty free

• Paraben free, Sulfate free, Gluten free, Palm Oil free

Shades

Valor - Grounded in a velvety splash of marsala, Valor is impeccable for a sexy air of mystery—or a raucous flare of vivacity. No matter which secrets get spilled, this long-lasting shade keeps lips buttery and soft until the sun glows on the horizon.

Serene - Serene’s down-tempo fusion of burnished rosewood and brown sugar delicately glazes the lips. Perfect for roof-top lounging or board-room ruling, pair Serene with bold eye-shadow or a cat-eye swoop for a seductive effect.

Keen - Quirky and bold, Keen spins a spell of charisma on your smile. With a baseline color of caramelized grapefruit and the highlight of translucent watermelon, Keen’s sure to turn the heads of tastemakers, every time.

Enchant - Like blustery cliffs of wild heather, Enchant’s boysenberry stain alights your lips in finespun color. The base of cool mauve with a tilt of silver keeps your pout supple and shimmering—whether worn for snow-lit walks or festival romps.

Intrigue - For days when you need a deep + demure hue, Intrigue is perfectly suited. With a base of toasted cinnamon balanced by muted rose, this versatile shade will follow you from asana mornings through to dinner party evenings. No matter where you go, your look will be cultivated and you lips will stay silky.

Bliss - Subtle in its sensuality, Bliss is a dainty salmon pink braided with a shimmering arc of gold. Don’t be mistaken by Bliss’s pale luster: this hue is ride or die, lasting through the star-studded night to Sunday brunch...should you so desire.

Ingredients

Shea Butter*, Candelilla Wax*, Castor Oil, Organic Avocado Oil, Organic Avocado Butter, Organic Moringa Oil, Vitamin E Oil, Elderberry Extract, Neem Oil, Sweet Orange Essential Oil May Contain: Iron Oxide, Titanium Dioxide, Manganese Violet, Mica

*Denotes Wild Harvested

Directions

entry.title: Lipstick
entry.summary:
Vendor: Axiology
Type: Lipstick
Price: 30.00

Axiology’s deeply nourishing formula is comprised of all-natural ingredients that keep lips soft & kissable—for hours on end. The comfortable, long-lasting pigments maintain their rich color while providing continuous moisture. With a silky-smooth finish and safe, delicious elements, their lip line is made for the conscious and kind lipstick devotee.

• 100% Natural, 100% Vegan, Cruelty free

• Paraben free, Sulfate free, Gluten free, Palm Oil free

Shades

True - True is enduring romance; a rare jewel of plant-derived red. This succulent shade is a manifesto to possibility; the hue you slip on to write love letters and bucket lists. Like a wild sunrise, the deep base of vermillion crowns your pout and finishes with a canyon-coral touch.

Worth - Sometimes you need a fiery pout to suit your flirtatious smirk. Worth is a bittersweet red with undertones of warm tangerine that glides on with a creme-matte finish. No matter what your skin tone, Worth produces a sizzling effect that compliments both dazzling evening looks and carefree, daytime casuals.

Noble - A succulent, hybrid peach-pink coral tone that keeps lips looking glossy and fresh. Supremely wearable for a first date or an interview, this color highlights your smile in a classy, honeyed glow.

Attitude - Perfect for Spring and Summer, Attitude glides on as a hot, hibiscus-pink pop with a blush of blue undertones. Popular among both world-travelers and urbanites, this color evokes lustrous Indian saris and bright neon billboards—and will keep your lips loaded with moisture.

Fundamental - Has an earthy russet base with a hint of rose-gold finish. Punchy by day and a sexy choice for night; this creamy hue will boldly frame the words you speak—no matter when you’re wearing it.

Elusive - Keep them guessing with a burgundy-drenched tone that satiates your desire for stand-out color. Elusive pours onto your pout like a fine wine splash, matching an elegant ensemble or dressed-down jeans and a crisp t-shirt. Cream-based and demure, this color will enhance even the most sensual of secret rendezvous.

The Goodness - Dances on the lips in a playful, sea-shell shimmer that stays all day. The blush-pink base has a creamy finish highlighted with an added dimension of silvery sheen. Suitable for meeting your partner’s parents or ocean frolicking, this shade will keep your smile shining sweetly.

BAD - Dramatic and daring, this runway-ready hue pins to the lip in burnt chestnut with a copper tinge. We crafted this color with a nod to the fierce supermodels of the 90’s who first donned it—and to the mavericks like Lana Del Rey and Katy Perry who are bringing it back. BAD is best worn after the sun goes down.

Dimension - An earthy Fall and Winter shade, Dimension is a burnished brown sheer balm with a light shimmer finish. Ideal for everyday or special events, it’s rich and dynamic hue nourishes lips long after application. Pair it well with a blushed cheek and strong eyebrow.

Infinite - Flirt without words wearing Infinite’s rich mulberry stain. The intense dark violet base is cheered with subtle layers of black and brown, making it the perfect hue for complexions of all shades. Worn with a cool suit, it pulls an outfit together with precision—donned with a cocktail dress, it exudes passion and confidence.

Desire - With a base of royal purple shot through a lilac sheen, Desire is a dreamy shade fit for a bohemian queen. Great for fun weekend wear or a naughty evening of memorable trouble, this naturally glossy color brings out your cool, Coachella vibe.

Phenomenon - Deep cobalt like a midnight lagoon, Phenomenon wows with avant-garde style and sci-fi sass. This sheer balm with blue and black hues will rock your bold, brave lips—whether you wear it everyday, or save it for a blue moon.

Devotion - With a copper burnt-sugar base and an echo of rose quartz, Devotion is the girl-crush of natural-look lovers. Its buttery luster keeps lips flawlessly moisturized and supple. Pair Devotion with powerful eye-makeup for maximum effect, or apply every day for a nearly-bare look.

Intrinsic - Sheer, subtle, and shimmering-balm, this shade will make your lips look like a wind-swept beach at golden hour. Intrinsic is ultra-moisturizing with a high-gloss sheen, best paired with a dramatic eye for ultimate flair.

Theory - With a light brown base and a whisper of rose, Theory colors your lips with a matte finish. The versatility of the day-into-night hue is complemented by it’s long-lasting moisturizing properties, and works especially well with a sun-kissed complexion.

Virtue - A luminous, sheer spark of golden orange that’s great for balmy summer nights. With a glimmer of red, this lipstick possesses a quiet, fiery glow that’s sure to light up the room.

Philosophy - For both bold romantics and wall-flowers, Philosophy’s ultra-smooth pink blends with a twist of salmon—bringing to life even the shyest of lips. Like a pair of well-loved ballet slippers, this shade is soft, silky, and just-a-touch sweet.

Identity - Inspired by the rush of peony season, Identity is a glittering cool pink with a lavender lean. This dreamy hue is perfect for a look that needs a subtle touch of off-beat color—while staying classic and collected.

Vibration - A scarlet wash with a glint of pink, Vibration is a sunset glow on a desert rose. The matte-cream base loads your pout with moisture, keeping it punch-drunk in color. Vibration is best worn while road-tripping into the horizon, or blazing top-down through lit cityscapes.

Enlighten - Daydream up a storm in Enlighten’s mesmerizing gloss. Enlighten rolls on the lips as an amethyst glaze, lifted by a silver-glitter finish. Like a rain-soaked field of wild lilacs, this color keeps your pout perfectly drenched in nourishing moisture.

Instinct - Stripped of all pretensions, Instinct is an understated nude with a sandcastle glitter. Flaxen like a metallic meadow, Instinct’s shy sparkle stays mysterious and gifts your lips with lasting moisture. This versatile hue works well day or night, no matter where your fanciful spirit takes you.

Existential - Deep, dynamic, and dark: meet the siren-song of shades. Existential glides on with a matte obsidian tone and holds on tight to your pout while keeping it silky-soft. Whether you’re going full-on glam, gothic, or rock and roll, you can be sure your mouth will maintain the color of a black pearl, all night long.

Ingredients

Candelilla Wax, Organic Avocado Oil, Organic Castor Oil, Organic Avocado Butter, Organic Grape Seed Oil, Organic Coconut Oil, Vitamin E Oil, Elderberry Extract, Sweet Orange Oil, Neem Seed Oil; May Contain: Iron Oxide, Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Manganese Violet.

Directions

entry.title: Carrot Color Pot
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ere Perez
Type: Cheek & Lip Tint
Price: 32.00

This multitasking balm adds instant color to the cheeks without the use of any animal derivatives - making it the perfect vegan cheek & lip balm. It also features an array of skin-healthy ingredients such as carrots and is chock-full of antioxidants, helping to keep skin soft + hydrated.

A small pot of goodness that fits in your pocket with a practical mirror lid for touch ups so you can lift your look anytime, anywhere.

• .22 oz / 6.5 g

Ingredients

hydrogenated olive (olea europea) oil, candelilla (euphorbia cerifera) wax, ozokerite, caprylic/capric triglyceride, avocado (persea gratissima) oil, carrot (daucus carota sativa) oil, tocopheryl acetate (vitamin E). May contain +/– Iron oxides, CI77019, CI77891.

Directions

Apply balm with Ere Perez's eco vegan multipurpose brush directly to the cheeks in round movements, blending as little or as much as you like. Repeat for deeper color. For lips, apply with the eco vegan concealer & lip brush over top and bottom lip and rub lips together.

entry.title: Nudist Multi-Use Duo
entry.summary:
Vendor: W3ll People
Type: Makeup
Price: 25.00

This magic, multi-tasking vegan cosmetic adds gorgeous sheer, natural color to cheeks, lips, and eyes. Rich in skin-soothing organic aloe + antioxidants to hydrate and improve overall skin quality. The creamy formula has a satiny smooth, weightless texture – free from all harsh, artificial chemicals and petroleum.

Enjoy premium, high-performance organic botanicals that provide weightless all-day wear with no creasing.

• Blush, eyeshadow and lip stain all-in-one

• Flattering nude shades for all ages and skin tones

• Quick & easy application; blends beautifully with fingertips

• Vegan, Hypoallergenic, Cruelty Free & Noncomedogenic

• EWG Verified for non-toxic health and safety

Free From: Parabens, Gluten, GMOs, Phthalates, Sulfates, Fragrance, Pheonoxyethanol, Dimethicone, PEG, Propylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Lead, Mineral Oil, Talc.

Ingredients

Helianthus Annus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil*, Candelilla (Euphorbia Cerifera) Wax, Copernica Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax*, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter*, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Shorea Robusta Resin, Rhus Verniciflua Peel Wax, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter) Fruit*, Silica, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil*, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil*, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch*, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf*, Matricaria Chamomilla (Chamomile) Flowers*, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf*, Tocopherol, Phenethyl Alcohol, Ethyhexylglycerin, +/- Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxide, Red 7

Directions

Warm and blend product onto eyes, cheeks, or lips using fingertips, or W3LL PEOPLE Foundation Brush

entry.title: Lumiere Luminous Complexion Fluid
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gressa Skin
Type: Tinted Moisturizer
Price: 28.00

A gorgeous serum pigment adaptable to any skin tone. The possibilities are limitless. Use it on cheeks, eyelids or lips for a quick tint. This unique formulation nourishes while providing luminosity and ultimate versatility.

• Vegan

• .16 oz / 5 ml

Ingredients

*Ricinus communis (Castor) Seed Oil, *Brassica oleracea italica (Broccoli) Seed Oil, *Rosa canina (Rosehip) Seed Oil, *Hippophae rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn) Seed Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Oleosomes, Rosemary Extract, CoEnzymeQ10, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, May Contain: Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxide (CI77499, CI77492, CI77491), *Proprietary blend of therapeutic precious oils. *CERTIFIED ORGANIC

Directions

SHAKE WELL to disperse the pigment. Half a pump is plenty for one application. Apply to cheeks by pressing with fingers in a lifting motion. If desired, tint your lips or eyelids by tapping the pigment gently.

entry.title: Lip Boost
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gressa Skin
Type: Lip Sheer
Price: 29.00

Glam your pout with Gressa Lip Boost. Light, non-sticky and moisturizing, it feels like a balm yet looks like a gloss.

Aux Rouge - “The red”. Classic statement of strength, sensuality your own feminine signature.

Bare - Sheer, nude, and sexy, Your lips but better.

Brilliant - Minimalistic, light with specks of sophisticated shimmer.

Lavish - Sheer, sexy, and sultry. Luxurious, velvety, plum.

Radiant - Bright, glowing and lustrous. Modern, timeless, seductive and playful.

Regal - Suitable for a queen. A deep dark plum, warm and voluptuous.

• .24 oz / 7 ml

Ingredients

*Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, *Butyrospermum (Shea) parkii Butter, Magnifera Indica (Mango) Butter, *Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, *Seabuckthorn Seed Oil, Ubiquinone (CoEnzyme Q10),*Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Extract, Tocopherol (Vitamin E) Non-GMO, Mica, Iron Oxides. *CERTIFIED ORGANIC

Directions

Wear alone or over any lip color of your preference.

entry.title: Lip + Cheek Stain
entry.summary:
Vendor: Fat and The Moon
Type: lip and cheek tint
Price: 14.00

A Lip + Cheek Stain that isn't too pink with shades of a little red wine mixed with a little blackberry, free of heavy metal based color. Alkanet and beet root give this stain its rich color and its mild and earthy scent, with just a touch of essential oil of rose geranium. Rose geranium is used in aromatherapy to reduce nervousness and tension, and has mild antibacterial, astringent and anti-inflammatory properties, which all aid in the overall health of the skin. A little dab of this stuff on the apples of your cheeks and on your lips adds just the right dose of color. Because of the beeswax, this stain has great staying power. Put a little on for a subtle effect or more for a lipstick like look.

Heads up: Some find the smell of the alkanet root too earthy for their tastes - alkanet has a flave akin to valerian root.

• All Natural + Organic Ingredients

• Paraben free, Cruelty free

• .5 oz

Ingredients

alkanet root* and beet root* infused sunflower oil*, beeswax, essential oil of rose geranium*. *organic

Directions

A little dab of this stuff on the apples of your cheeks and on your lips adds just the right dose of color.

entry.title: Lip Tints
entry.summary:
Vendor: French Girl Organics
Type: Lip Treatment
Price: 16.00

A lustrous balm and emollient mineral lip tint in one. Formulated with an enriching blend of organic & wildcrafted waxes, butters, and oils to leave lips moisturized while adding a subtle pop of color, perfect for everyday.

Scent: Rose | Mint

Deeply emollient Shea Butter and plant oils moisturize and condition lips. Pure Organic Essential Oils - add a light minty scent and flavor. Natural Iron Oxides and Micas - provide sheer pigment without artificial color or carmine.

- Shades -

Ambre Noire - Dark burgundy with a golden sheen

Ambre Rose - Warm rosy nude with a sheer finish

Aphrodesie - Sheer violet-pink with a cool-toned shimmer

Cerise - Neutral medium-red with a sheer finish

Claire - Clear balm

Rose Noire - Black cherry red with a sheer finish

Sonali - Peachy pink with a pearlescent sheen

Terre Rouge - Terracotta red with a copper sheen

Véronique - Warm coral red with a copper sheen

Violette - Berry red with a golden shimmer

Ingredients

Olea europaea (Olive) Oil*, Euphorbia anisyphilitica (Candelilla) Wax* Cocos nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, Butyrospermum parkii (Shea) Butter*, Sustainable Elaeis guineensis (Palm) Oil* Simmondsia chinensis (Jojoba) Oil*, Rosa mosqueta (Rosehip) Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Melia Azadirachta (Neem Seed Oil)*, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary Leaf) Extract*, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower Seed) Oil*, Iron Oxides, Mica, Pelergoniun graveolens (Rose Geranium), Mentha piperita (Peppermint) Essential Oils*, Mentha Spicata (Spearmint)* *Certified Organic

Directions

Apply to lips as needed!

entry.title: Lipstick - LET'S KISS
entry.summary:
Vendor: treat collection
Type: Lipstick
Price: 26.00

LET'S KISS - Subtle Nude Glow

The perfect mix of color and creamy shine, treat collection's Lipcolors feel lightweight while they moisturize and condition your lips. From subtle nudes to classic reds, there is the perfect color for every skin tone and every occasion.

Lipcolors can be worn alone or dressed up with your choice of Treat Collection Lipshine!

All Lipcolors are gluten and cruelty free and formulated without parabens, petrochemicals, phthalates, GMOs, triclosans and synthetic fragrances, which can contain harmful toxins. Instead, they use natural ingredients such as lanolin - helps to improve skin texture and reduce signs of aging, castor seed oil – a natural antibacterial and antiseptic agent, jojoba oil – a natural antiseptic with anti-aging qualities, and honeysuckle – which provides natural UV protection and also possesses anti-aging and regenerative properties, to ultimately create smooth, moisturizing Lipcolors with a subtle hint of natural vanilla fragrance.

• Made in the USA

Ingredients

Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Cetyl Acetate (and) Acetylated Lanolin Alcohol, Cetyl Ricinoleate, Euphorbis Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Lanolin Oil, Propylene Glycol, Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Ozokerite, Ricinus Communis, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, Copernica Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Cera Microcristallina (Microcrystalline) Wax, VP/Hexadecene Coploymer, Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Natural Vanilla. +/- Mica (CI 77019), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, 77492, 77499), Red 21 Lake (CI 45380), Orange 5 Lake (CI 45370), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Utramarine Blue (CI 77007), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Red 33 Lake (CI 17200), Red 27 Lake (CI 45410), Red 6 Lake (CI 15850), Red 36 Lake (CI 12085), Red 30 (CI 73360), D&C Red No.30 (CI 75470)

Directions

Lipcolors can be worn alone or dressed up with your choice of Treat Collection Lipshine.
